rooms.room-category-description: A spacious and luxurious room with a king-sized bed, a private balcony, and a sea view.
An elegant and modern suite with a separate living area, a private Jacuzzi, and a city view.
A comfortable and cozy room with a queen-sized bed, a private bathroom, and an ocean view.
A spacious and modern room with a king-sized bed, a private balcony, and a panoramic ocean view.
A cozy and compact room with a single bed, a private bathroom, and a city view.
A spacious and comfortable room with a queen-sized bed, a private balcony, and a city view.
